languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, мне передали, что вы призываете семейство Эребис ко двору. Ваши подданные уже прибыли во дворец вместе с четырьмя отпрысками. Они примут участие в приеме в честь вашего возвращения на мир-столицу".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, мне доложили о прошении Высокого фактотума организовать встречу с семейством Эрэбис. Высокие гости уже прибыли во дворец вместе с четырьмя отпрысками. Они примут участие в светском приеме, организованном в честь вашего возвращения на мир-столицу, где вы и сможете обсудить с ними насущные вопросы".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, мне передали, что вы призываете семейство Эребис ко двору. Ваши подданные уже прибыли во дворец вместе с четырьмя отпрысками. Они примут участие в приеме в честь вашего возвращения на мир-столицу".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told you summoned the Erebis family to your court. These subjects of yours have already arrived at your palace with their offspring of four. They will take part in the reception on the occasion of your return to the capital world."

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told you summoned the Erebis family to your court. These subjects of yours have already arrived at your palace with their offspring of four. They will take part in the reception on the occasion of your return to the capital world."

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at your palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at your palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, il paraît que vous aviez invité la famille Erebis à vous rejoindre à la cour. Les sujets en question, ainsi que leurs quatre enfants, sont déjà arrivés au palais. Ils seront présents à la réception donnée en l'honneur de votre retour sur le monde-capitale. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, il paraît que vous aviez invité la famille Erebis à vous rejoindre à la cour. Les sujets en question, ainsi que leurs quatre enfants, sont déjà arrivés au palais. Ils seront présents à la réception donnée en l'honneur de votre retour sur le monde-capitale. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, he sido informada de que ha convocado a la familia Erebis a su corte. Sus súbditos en cuestión, junto a sus cuatro vástagos, ya están en el palacio. Asistirán a la recepción en honor de su regreso al mundo capital».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, he sido informada de que ha convocado a la familia Erebis a su corte. Sus súbditos en cuestión, junto a sus cuatro vástagos, ya están en el palacio. Asistirán a la recepción en honor de su regreso al mundo capital».

languages.text: 「陛下、エレビス家を宮殿に召集されたと聞いております。件の家臣は4人の子孫を連れてすでに宮殿に到着しました。彼らは、あなた様が首都惑星へ帰還されたことを祝う歓迎の場に出席する予定です」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、エレビス家を宮殿に召集されたと聞いております。件の家臣は4人の子孫を連れてすでに宮殿に到着しました。彼らは、あなた様が首都惑星へ帰還されたことを祝う歓迎の場に出席する予定です」

languages.text: “大人，我听说您准备召见伊雷比斯家族前往您的宫廷。伊雷比斯家族成员与他们的四位子女已经抵达了宫殿。他们将出席您的招待会，欢迎您重归首都世界。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我听说您准备召见伊雷比斯家族前往您的宫廷。伊雷比斯家族成员与他们的四位子女已经抵达了宫殿。他们将出席您的招待会，欢迎您重归首都世界。”

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, mir wurde berichtet, dass Ihr die Familie Erebis an Euren Hof geladen habt. Die fraglichen Untertanen sind zusammen mit ihren vier Nachkommen bereits im Palast eingetroffen. Sie werden an dem Empfang zu Ehren Eurer Rückkehr in die Hauptwelt teilnehmen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, mir wurde berichtet, dass Ihr die Familie Erebis an Euren Hof geladen habt. Die fraglichen Untertanen sind zusammen mit ihren vier Nachkommen bereits im Palast eingetroffen. Sie werden an dem Empfang zu Ehren Eurer Rückkehr in die Hauptwelt teilnehmen."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Erebis ailesini huzurunuza çağırdığınızı duydum. Konuklarınız, çocuklarıyla birlikte hâlihazırda saraya ulaşmışlar. Başdünyaya dönüşünüzü kutlayacak merasimde yer alacaklar."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I have been told that you summoned the Erebis family to your court. Your subjects in question, along with their four offspring, have already arrived at the palace. They will attend the reception honouring your return to the capital world."
